header.headline: The Team
header.caption: A server is only as strong as the team behind it. Meet our team to find out why we are so passionate about what we do.

lenovouser.name: lenovouser | Silas
lenovouser.description: My name is Silas, and I was born in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. I have lived in Portugal for 3 years, and 2 years in the US. I am very interested in design.

housejumper.name: housejumper | Bjarne
housejumper.description: I am Bjarne and 15 years old. For quite some time I have been intensely in touch with Minecraft servers and Bukkit⁄Spigot plugins. Currently I am learning HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.

mrrumpunsh.name: MrRumpunsh | Max
mrrumpunsh.description: My name is Maximilian, I am 18 years old, live in Austria and I love Java.
